com.btmatthews.utils.monitor

Interface MonitorObserver

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractRunMojo

    public interface MonitorObserver
    Implemented by objects that want to receive notifications from the monitor when a server has started or stopped.
    Since:
    1.1.0
    Author:
    Brian Matthews

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void started(Server server, Logger logger)
      This callback is called after the server has started.
      void stopped(Server server, Logger logger)
      This callback is called after the server has exited.

    • Method Detail

      • started

        void started(Server server,
           Logger logger)
        This callback is called after the server has started.
        Parameters:
        server - The server that was started.
        logger - Used to log information and error messages.

      • stopped

        void stopped(Server server,
           Logger logger)
        This callback is called after the server has exited.
        Parameters:
        server - The server that was exited.
        logger - Used to log information and error messages.
